title: T-Minus 21 Days: What the heck happened to T-Minus 22?
body:
Seriously now. Who deleted the post I wrote last night in a fog of tiredness? I spent a good 10 minutes crafting a Pulitzer-worthy post, and now it's nowhere to be found. What gives?! Oh well. Not much went on yesterday anyhow.

Today, however, was different. We finally got the keys to our new space (woo hoo!), we locked up our bid on audio equipment ($$$$$ = XO~ [that's me puking]), and we're nearing a decision on the chairs. If you don't mind, I think I'm going to hold out a little while longer before I announce which chairs we've selected. Hell, I might just wait right up to the eve of the MNC (Moxie National Convention) and then surprise everyone with chairs from Canada. Only time will tell.

The new space is coming along swimmingly, which is exactly what I was hoping for leading up to the long holiday weekend. My uncle - the same one who helped us install our screen and speakers back in 2005 - is supposed to be coming up this weekend to take a look at the new spot, but I haven't heard from him yet. Isn't that exiting?! Aren't these update posts riveting to read?! It's like you're right there in the trenches with us!

Sorry. I'm just embarrassed that these posts don't have more meat on them. Also, it's really hot in the vault, which is where I'm typing this from, and that's making me cranky. I better call it a night. Have a great holiday weekend everyone, and we'll see you again on Monday!
author: Dan

comments.author: stevie_g
comments.body:
Howdy-ho everybody. I've updated my Moxie 2.0 photo page on flickr for those who might be interested:

http://www.flickr.com/photos/87104832@N00/sets/72157606446460571/

Please. Somebody...anybody...*SOB*
